main event: A visual observation of a strange object in the sky near Cherryville, North Carolina.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes,The object appeared solid and red with a few white lights,The witness reported the object did not make any sound and seemed to glow,It was observed at an altitude of approximately 5,000 to 10,000 feet,No photographs were present as evidence.
sighted object: one solid red object with lights
witness description: The witness described seeing the object while driving in an automobile.
